verses.verse: Then the second <S%H8145><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> fell <S%H3318><s%> to Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> to the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
So they had <S%H1961><s%> as their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> Beersheba <S%H884><s%> or Sheba <S%H9579><s%> and Moladah, <S%H4137><s%>
and Hazar-shual and Balah <S%H1088><s%> and Ezem, <S%H6107><s%>
and Eltolad <S%H513><s%> and Bethul <S%H1329><s%> and Hormah, <S%H2767><s%>
and Ziklag <S%H6860><s%> and Beth-marcaboth and Hazar-susah,
and Beth-lebaoth and Sharuhen, <S%H8287><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages; <S%H9161><s%>
Ain, <S%H5871><s%> Rimmon <S%H9558><s%> and Ether <S%H6281><s%> and Ashan, <S%H6228><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages; <S%H9161><s%>

and all <S%H3605><s%> the villages <S%H9161><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [were] around <S%H5439><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Baalath-beer, Ramah <S%H9561><s%> of the Negev. <S%H9561><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

The inheritance <S%H5157><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> [was taken] from the portion <S%H2506><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> for the share <S%H2506><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was too <S%H4480><s%> large <S%H7227><s%> for them; so the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> received <S%H5157><s%> [an] inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Judah's inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

Now the third <S%H7992><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%> And the territory <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was as far <S%H5704><s%> as Sarid. <S%H8301><s%>

Then their border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the west <S%H3220><s%> and to Maralah, <S%H4831><s%> it then touched <S%H6293><s%> Dabbesheth, <S%H1708><s%> and reached <S%H6293><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> that is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jokneam. <S%H3362><s%>

Then it turned <S%H7725><s%> from Sarid <S%H8301><s%> to the east <S%H9506><s%> toward the sunrise <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> as far <S%H5921><s%> as the border <S%H1366><s%> of Chisloth-tabor, and it proceeded <S%H3318><s%> to Daberath <S%H1705><s%> and up to Japhia. <S%H3309><s%>

And from there <S%H8033><s%> it continued <S%H5674><s%> eastward <S%H9506><s%> toward the sunrise <S%H4217><s%> to Gath-hepher, to Eth-kazin, and it proceeded <S%H3318><s%> to Rimmon <S%H9558><s%> which stretches <S%H9638><s%> to Neah. <S%H5269><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> circled <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> it on the north <S%H6828><s%> to Hannathon, <S%H2615><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Iphtahel. <S%H3317><s%>

[Included] also [were] Kattah <S%H7005><s%> and Nahalal <S%H5096><s%> and Shimron <S%H8110><s%> and Idalah <S%H3030><s%> and Bethlehem; <S%H1035><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
The fourth <S%H7243><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> fell <S%H3318><s%> to Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
And their territory <S%H1366><s%> was to Jezreel <S%H3157><s%> and [included] Chesulloth <S%H3694><s%> and Shunem, <S%H7766><s%>
and Hapharaim <S%H2663><s%> and Shion <S%H7866><s%> and Anaharath, <S%H588><s%>
and Rabbith <S%H7245><s%> and Kishion <S%H7191><s%> and Ebez, <S%H77><s%>
and Remeth <S%H7432><s%> and En-gannim and En-haddah and Beth-pazzez.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> reached <S%H6293><s%> to Tabor <S%H8396><s%> and Shahazumah <S%H7831><s%> and Beth-shemesh, and their border <S%H1366><s%> ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Now the fifth <S%H2549><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> fell <S%H3318><s%> to the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
And their territory <S%H1366><s%> was Helkath <S%H2520><s%> and Hali <S%H2482><s%> and Beten <S%H991><s%> and Achshaph, <S%H407><s%>
and Allammelech <S%H487><s%> and Amad <S%H6008><s%> and Mishal; <S%H4861><s%> and it reached <S%H6293><s%> to Carmel <S%H3760><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> and to Shihor-libnath.

And it turned <S%H7725><s%> toward the east <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> to Beth-dagon, and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Iphtahel <S%H3317><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> to Beth-emek and Neiel; <S%H5272><s%> then it proceeded <S%H3318><s%> on north <S%H8040><s%> to Cabul, <S%H3521><s%>
and Ebron <S%H5683><s%> and Rehob <S%H7340><s%> and Hammon <S%H2540><s%> and Kanah, <S%H7071><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Great <S%H7227><s%> Sidon. <S%H6721><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> to Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> and to the fortified <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> of Tyre; <S%H6865><s%> then the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> to Hosah, <S%H2621><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the sea <S%H3220><s%> by the region <S%H9112><s%> of Achzib. <S%H392><s%>
[Included] also [were] Ummah, <S%H5981><s%> and Aphek <S%H663><s%> and Rehob; <S%H7340><s%> twenty-two cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> fell <S%H3318><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

And their border <S%H1366><s%> was from Heleph, <S%H2501><s%> from the oak <S%H436><s%> in Zaanannim <S%H6815><s%> and Adami-nekeb and Jabneel, <S%H2995><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Lakkum; <S%H3946><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

Then the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to Aznoth-tabor, and proceeded <S%H3318><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> to Hukkok; <S%H2712><s%> and it reached <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> and touched <S%H6293><s%> Asher <S%H836><s%> on the west, <S%H3220><s%> and to Judah <S%H3063><s%> at the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the east. <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%>
And the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> [were] Ziddim, <S%H6661><s%> Zer <S%H6863><s%> and Hammath, <S%H2575><s%> Rakkath <S%H7557><s%> and Chinnereth, <S%H3672><s%>
and Adamah <S%H128><s%> and Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Hazor, <S%H2674><s%>
and Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> and Edrei <S%H154><s%> and En-hazor,
and Yiron <S%H3375><s%> and Migdal-el, Horem <S%H2765><s%> and Beth-anath and Beth-shemesh; nineteen <S%H8672><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
The seventh <S%H7637><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> fell <S%H3318><s%> to the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
And the territory <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol <S%H847><s%> and Ir-shemesh,
and Shaalabbin <S%H8169><s%> and Aijalon <S%H357><s%> and Ithlah, <S%H3494><s%>
and Elon <S%H356><s%> and Timnah <S%H8553><s%> and Ekron, <S%H6138><s%>
and Eltekeh <S%H514><s%> and Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%> and Baalath, <S%H1191><s%>
and Jehud <S%H3055><s%> and Bene-berak and Gath-rimmon,
and Me-jarkon and Rakkon, <S%H7542><s%> with the territory <S%H1366><s%> over <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> Joppa. <S%H3305><s%>

And the territory <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> proceeded <S%H3318><s%> beyond <S%H3318><s%> <S%H4480><s%> them; for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Leshem <S%H3959><s%> and captured <S%H3920><s%> it. Then they struck <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> it and settled <S%H3427><s%> in it; and they called <S%H7121><s%> Leshem <S%H3959><s%> Dan <S%H1835><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> their father.

This <S%H2088><s%> [was] the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

When they finished <S%H3615><s%> apportioning <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by its borders, <S%H1367><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in their midst <S%H8432><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>

In accordance <S%H5921><s%> with the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> him the city <S%H5892><s%> for which <S%H834><s%> he asked, <S%H7592><s%> Timnath-serah in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%> So he built <S%H1129><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> and settled <S%H3427><s%> in it.

These <S%H428><s%> are the inheritances <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the households of the tribes <S%H1><s%> of the sons <S%H4294><s%> of Israel <S%H1121><s%> distributed <S%H3478><s%> by lot <S%H5157><s%> in Shiloh <S%H1486><s%> before <S%H7887><s%> the Lord, <S%H6440><s%> at the doorway <S%H3068><s%> of the tent <S%H6607><s%> of meeting. <S%H168><s%> So they finished <S%H4150><s%> dividing <S%H3615><s%> the land. <S%H2505><s%>
